page.title: 20Schools in Rye and Playden
page.content: In our area there are three schools. Our school is aprimary school, consisting of children between the ages of 4 and 11 years. Another school in our area, called Freda Gardham, has many more pupils than Playden and has children from as far as Camber and Rye Harbour. The third school is Thomas Peacocke Upper School. This is the top part of the area Comprehensive and as well as those from Rye it draws children from all the surrounding villages, who have to be brought by bus. This is for the children between the ages of 13 and 18.
